name: Nocturne (itch) (Team SolEtude, mtrovy, mari)
description:
"You alone will have stars as no one else has them"  - Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

This cute little creation is a narrative, music-based puzzle game, done in a week for the Develop to Help - Ukraine game jam! Enjoy!

A man is stranded in deep space, with no memories except a sense of purpose: he needs to somehow find his way back home; throughout the journey he writes in a diary as he starts to remember, with the help of… someone.

Notes:

We weren't able to make all puzzles playable in time for the jam. We will update the game after voting ends. We hope you can enjoy the part of the game that is playable in the meantime <3

Tips for playing:

If you are stuck in a puzzle, you can press the "H" key to skip it! So that you can sample all the puzzles and play the full story ^-^

Credits:

Art and UI: catamariii, Francesco Ruggero

Music and Sound design: DeoMusicl

Programming: mtrovy

Narrative and game design: Lidia Santoemma
